languages.text: "Не вижу ни одного священного кодекса Лекс Империалис. Как можно считать это место часовней, если здесь нет слов Его?"

traits.locale_text: "Не вижу ни одного священного кодекса Лекс Империалис. Как можно считать это место часовней, если здесь нет слов Его?"

languages.text: "Not one sacred codex of the Lex Imperialis in sight. How can you call this place a chapel if it doesn't have His words?"
languages.original_text: "Не вижу ни одного священного кодекса Лекс Империалис. Как можно считать это место часовней, если здесь нет слов Его?"

traits.locale_text: "Not one sacred codex of the Lex Imperialis in sight. How can you call this place a chapel if it doesn't have His words?"
"Not one sacred codex of the Lex Imperialis in sight. How can you call this place a chapel if it doesn't have His words?"
"Not one sacred codex of the Lex Imperialis in sight. How can you call this place a chapel if it doesn't have His words?"
"Not one sacred codex of the Lex Imperialis in sight. How can you call this place a chapel if it doesn't have His words?"
"Not one sacred codex of the Lex Imperialis in sight. How can you call this place a chapel if it doesn't have His words?"
"Not one sacred codex of the Lex Imperialis in sight. How can you call this place a chapel if it doesn't have His words?"

languages.text: 「レックス・インペリアの聖なる教典が一冊も見当たらないとは。こんな場所を、どうして『礼拝堂』などと呼べるんだ？」
languages.original_text: "Not one sacred codex of the Lex Imperialis in sight. How can you call this place a chapel if it doesn't have His words?"

traits.locale_text: 「レックス・インペリアの聖なる教典が一冊も見当たらないとは。こんな場所を、どうして『礼拝堂』などと呼べるんだ？」

languages.text: "Kein einziger heiliger Kodex des Lex Imperia in Sicht. Wie kann man diesen Ort als Kapelle bezeichnen, wenn das Wort des Imperators nicht zu finden ist?"
languages.original_text: "Not one sacred codex of the Lex Imperialis in sight. How can you call this place a chapel if it doesn't have His words?"

traits.locale_text: "Kein einziger heiliger Kodex des Lex Imperia in Sicht. Wie kann man diesen Ort als Kapelle bezeichnen, wenn das Wort des Imperators nicht zu finden ist?"

languages.text: « Je ne vois pas un seul codex sacré de la Lex Imperialis. Comment peut-on qualifier cet endroit de chapelle sans la présence de la parole de l'Empereur ? »
languages.original_text: "Not one sacred codex of the Lex Imperialis in sight. How can you call this place a chapel if it doesn't have His words?"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vois pas un seul codex sacré de la Lex Imperialis. Comment peut-on qualifier cet endroit de chapelle sans la présence de la parole de l'Empereur ? »

languages.text: «Ni un solo códice sagrado de la Lex Imperialis a la vista. ¿Cómo se puede llamar capilla a este lugar si no contiene Sus palabras?».
languages.original_text: "Not one sacred codex of the Lex Imperialis in sight. How can you call this place a chapel if it doesn't have His words?"

traits.locale_text: «Ni un solo códice sagrado de la Lex Imperialis a la vista. ¿Cómo se puede llamar capilla a este lugar si no contiene Sus palabras?».

languages.text: “这个地方甚至没有帝国法典的神圣经文。缺少了帝皇神圣的话语，这种地方又怎么能算得上是教堂？”
languages.original_text: "Not one sacred codex of the Lex Imperialis in sight. How can you call this place a chapel if it doesn't have His words?"

traits.locale_text: “这个地方甚至没有帝国法典的神圣经文。缺少了帝皇神圣的话语，这种地方又怎么能算得上是教堂？”

languages.text: "Görünürde tek bir Lex İmperialis cildi bile yok. O'nun sözlerini barındırmayan bir yere şapel demeye bin şahit ister."
languages.original_text: "Not one sacred codex of the Lex Imperialis in sight. How can you call this place a chapel if it doesn't have His words?"

traits.locale_text: "Görünürde tek bir Lex İmperialis cildi bile yok. O'nun sözlerini barındırmayan bir yere şapel demeye bin şahit ister."

languages.original_text: "Not one sacred codex of the Lex Imperialis in sight. How can you call this place a chapel if it doesn't have His words?"
